name: ohioan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Ohio: The new X-ray machine was invented by Ohioan Thomas Edison. Any Ohioan who graduated from high school could go to Ohio State University as long as there was room.
More examplesFewer examplesEighty-five percent of Ohioans are white.He wasn't the only Ohioan with reservations about the new road.Ohioans have always been proud of their place in national politics.

belonging or relating to the US state of Ohio or its people: The family moved to the Ohioan capital, Columbus. Ohioan farmers could easily ship crops all the way to the East Coast.
More examplesFewer examplesHis wife looks like a typical Ohioan woman.The candidates were tripping over themselves trying to get Ohioan voters.Reducing Ohio’s capital gains tax would slow the stream of Ohioan retirees to Florida and Texas.
